name: primal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the time when human life on earth began: The universe evolved from a densely packed primal inferno.
formal basic and relating to an early stage of development: a primal urge to connect with nature primal fears

characteristic of the earliest time in the existence of a person or thing; basic: The appeal of music is primal.
